Please note that using WMODE "Transparent" and "Opaque" will disable Mouse-Weel-Volume-Control on FFox, Chrome and Safari browsers. Please note that using WMODE "Opaque" or "Window" will require you to select your website's background color to avoid white pixels arround the player with some skins. Please note that using JS Events will cause Muses Radio Player to call a Javascript function named musesCallback to inform new events. Check to the F.A.Q. for details.
